org.klojang.jdbc - module org.klojang.jdbc
Klojang JDBC is a thin, non-intrusive abstraction layer around standard JDBC that builds on Klojang Templates to provide functionality not commonly found in JDBC extension libraries.
org.klojang.jdbc - package org.klojang.jdbc
Database utilities aimed at providing a quick route for database data to be inserted into Klojang templates.
org.klojang.jdbc.util - package org.klojang.jdbc.util
JDBC utility classes.
